amendment.description: Amendment conforms the authorizations for fossil energy research and development, and energy conservation research and development to the levels of the Interior appropriations conference report and reduces 1997 DOE authorizations by 20 percent from 1996 levels.
amendment.purpose: An amendment not preprinted in the Congressional Record, to extend the authorization levels in the bill for fossil fuels and energy development through FY 1997.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Walker amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
